column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Arnook says : " Men , you 'll be infiltrating the Fire Nation Navy .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fire Navy uniforms do n't look like that .
#Text=" Hahn says : " Of course they do .
#Text=These are real uniforms captured from actual Fire Navy soldiers .
#Text=" Sokka says : " When , like , a hundred years ago ?
#Text=" Arnook says : " Eighty - five .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The Fire Nation does n't wear shoulder spikes anymore .
#Text=The newer uniforms are more streamlined .
#Text=" Hahn says : " How do we know we can trust this guy ?
#Text=Such bold talk for a new recruit .
#Text=" Arnook says : " Sokka is from our sister tribe , Hahn .
#Text=He 's a capable warrior and I value his input .
#Text=Now , our first objective is to determine the identity of their commanding officer .
#Text=" Sokka says : " His name is Zhao .
#Text=Middle - aged , big sideburns , bigger temper ... " Arnook says : " Sokka , I want you to tell everything you know to Hahn .
#Text=He 's leading this mission .
#Text=Hahn , show Sokka your respect .
#Text=I expect nothing less from my future son - in - law .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Princess Yue 's marrying you ?
#Text=" Hahn says : " Yeah , what of it ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nothing .
#Text=Congratulations .
#Text="
